summary: This document appears to be a due diligence report conducted by PWM BIS-RESEARCH regarding The Haze Trust. The report indicates that thorough searches were performed with no significant negative media results found. It emphasizes the importance of compliance and the need for escalation in case of any alerts related to politically exposed persons (PEPs).

persons.name: Reena Chandwani
persons.context: Reena Chandwani is identified as the Research Analyst who prepared the due diligence report on The Haze Trust.

keyFacts: The due diligence report found no significant negative media results for The Haze Trust.
The report was prepared by Reena Chandwani on June 15, 2017.
All searches returned no alerts or hits, indicating compliance with AML standards.
The document emphasizes the need for escalation in case of alerts related to politically exposed persons (PEPs).
The report includes instructions for further searches and compliance checks.
